page.title: 15Templemoyle Dye Works
page.content: The factory is owned by Francis Dinsmore.Bleahing,dyeing and finishing cloth is done in it.The bails of cloth are brought in lorries.The one which is going to be white is bleached and washed and the one which is going to be dyed is just washed.Then it is dyed then it is passed through mangle rollers and through a stetnter which stretches it to a certain width and then it drys it at that width. Next it is put on big rolls or cut and put in parcels depending on what the customer wants.
